text: allah numbalage savan ha numbalage bælma atpat kara gena numbalage hadavat mata mudra tæbuve nam eya numbalata (nævata) gena ennata allah novana venat devindeku sitinne dæ yi numbala dænum dennæyi (nabivaraya!) numba asanu. ema sadhaka api vividha ayurin vistara karanne dæ yi avadhanayen balanu. pasuva da ovun pitupannan veti
